EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Invite Five Can't Miss 11-20-17
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Sessions You Won’t Want to Miss at SpringOne Platform 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, The hottest tech topics, the coolest industry speakers, fun parties, and plenty of networking opportunities at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]>. Hear from hundreds of practitioners about how you can build software people love.
Register today <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> to join Pivotal’s annual developer conference!
5 Sessions You Won’t Want to Miss!
A Journey Of Mobile, Microservices, and Speed to Market at the World's Largest Home Improvement Retailer <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions/a-journey-of-mobile-microservices-and-speed-to-market-at-the-worlds-largest-home-improvement-retailer?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> Dustin Bennett and Jermaine Davis discuss the mobile landscape at The Home Depot, where they are in the journey, and where they want to be. Code examples will be in Go and React as time permits.
Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Google Machine Learning, and Spring <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions/pivotal-cloud-foundry-google-machine-learning-and-spring?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> There’s probably no hotter topic these days than artificial intelligence (AI). Join Pivotal’s Brian Jimerson and Google’s Brian Gregory, to learn how to infuse your Spring applications running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry with AI via the Google Cloud Machine Learning API.
Adopting Pivotal Cloud Foundry At An Automobile Manufacturer <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions/adopting-pcf-at-an-automobile-manufacturer?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> Learn from the experience of Mercedes-Benz software architects in this case study covering project inception, conception, implementation and production, along with the ideas and gotchas on their path to digital transformation.
Latency and Event Tracing with Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions/latency-and-event-tracing-with-spring-cloud-data-flow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> Ascertaining what happened with an event as it flows through the system is a common challenge with event streaming systems. Developers from Charles Schwab will share how they solved for it in this session.
Automate Project Initiation to Deploy in Minutes <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions/automate-project-initiation-to-deploy-in-minutes?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]> Kroger Technology architects share how they streamlined Cloud Foundry adoption across their company by leveraging the APIs of Spring Initializr, Cloud Foundry, CI/CD tools, and databases to automate project initiation.
Register Today! <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-FiveSessions-q417]]>
Follow @s1p <[[https://twitter.com/@s1p]]> for the latest #springone <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]> updates and visit springoneplatform.io <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]> to see new sessions, agenda and main stage speakers.
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
